en.q1: What do I need to do to play the games?
en.q2: How much do I have to pay for which game?
en.q3: How long will the prize be transferred to my account if I win the game?
en.q4: What happens to the entry fee paid for the game if the connection is lost while playing?
en.q5: Can I top up my account balance through the site?
en.q6: Can I log in to the games if the balance in my wallet is insufficient?
en.q7: Where can I learn about the gameplay of the games?
en.a1: You need to connect your crypto wallet with the 'Connect to Wallet' button on the top right of the page. After linking the wallet, you can start playing the game of your choice by clicking the 'Play Now' button.
en.a2: The amount of the entrance fee will be displayed when you start playing the game you have selected from the game tab. The amount of the entrance fee for each game may vary.
en.a3: If you win the game, your prize will be transferred to your account at the end of the game.
en.a4: In case of disconnection while playing the game, you will be deemed to have lost the game when you cannot reconnect. The entry fee paid is not refundable.
en.a5: You cannot top up your account balance through the site.
en.a6: If the balance in your wallet is insufficient, you will not be able to log in to the games as the minimum entry fee cannot be met.
en.a7: When you log in to the games, there is information about how to play the games and in which results you will win.
en.lose2: You can try your luck one more time and win the prize.
en.metamask2: You can visit link for download Metamask.
en.win2: Your reward will be sent to your wallet shortly.
